html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-04862015-04-30,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActTransportation of Dangerous Goods Act, 1992
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TC 117 Tank Cars)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (TC 117 TANK CARS) in order to introduce specifications for a new class of tank car for flammable liquid dangerous goods service and require rail tank cars destined for flammable liquid service (e.g., crude oil, ethanol, gasoline, diesel fuel and aviation fuel) to be built to these specifications.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0100 Publication Date: 2015-05-20
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TC 117 Tank Cars)
precis: Regulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (TC 117 TANK CARS) in order to introduce specifications for a new class of tank car for flammable liquid dangerous goods service and require rail tank cars destined for flammable liquid service (e.g., crude oil, ethanol, gasoline, diesel fuel and aviation fuel) to be built to these specifications.
